name: VVVVV (tanaw)
description:
VVVVV is a comedy/horror visual novel. 

After inheriting his grandmother's ancestral home, Drogo hopes to sell it off so he can afford a better life in the city. It would be so easy, if only the house didn't have a couple unannounced residents who intend to make him stay... forever.

Features 2 endings with around 30 minutes of gameplay.

Content Warning: Flashing Lights

Controls

(E) or (Esc/Enter) to continue dialogue.

Return to main menu to load game.

Created by:

Lucy Choin - Writer

Tanaw - Artist/Dev

For Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam 2022
